body.stringValue:
Have you noticed that even the best professional athletes need a coach?  And all athletes need to exercise regularly in order to keep their body in top shape for competition?

So does our mind and soul need intellectual and spiritual conditioning.  Christian formation is about growing in faith, developing Christ-like character, and living out our calling as followers of Jesus. It is vital for nurturing spiritual maturity and fulfilling our purpose as believers.

The One Thing You Need

  • https://edify.us/video/the-one-thing-you-need/
